system.description:
Effect: The Weather becomes Smoggy for the next 3 Rounds.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Poison-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: Max Ooze
